name: Fist's Elimination Tower
description: A 2D platformer in which you play as randomly generated contestants that have to bounce their way to the top of an obstacle course full of robots, electric currents, explosives, and fists.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 Ghz, single core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP or better Processor: (2.0 Ghz, single core) or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
